Description:
SOMETHING FOR EVERYONE
This fully renovated unit in a plumb spot really does have a broad and varied appeal. Suiting numerous types of buyers, it would be perfect for the first home buyer, investor, downsizer, or retiree. Having been immaculately restored with polished boards, new kitchen, and bathroom, it also has a great outdoor entertaining area and a rare large parcel of yard space. Also, as a bonus it has both the carport and extra parking space outside the front door. In a complex of only 4, it is the back unit which means both quiet and privacy. The main living adjoins the L shaped dining which in turn is adjacent to the lovely kitchen. This overlooks the outdoor living ensuring a seamless flow from indoor to out. A hallway provides access to the 2 bedrooms and ends with the updated bathroom. Affordably priced to move fast, you will also have to move fast to secure it.

Description:
Over 1000sqm In Court Location
Perfectly positioned in a court location in Old Highton on approx 1004sqm, this home is simply stunning! The home offers generous proportions throughout, while established gardens suround the home to create a wonderful sense of privacy. As soon as you step inside the front door, youll fall in love with the sense of grandeur this home exudes. The open plan living/dining/kitchen provide an expansive setting that makes entertaining a breeze, with glass sliding doors providing access to the balcony. The kitchen unites style and functionality with ample storage, while quality stainless steel appliances include SMEG 900mm oven with gas cooktop and rangehood.
The second living area inspires relaxation, with double glass sliders opening into the spacious undercover decked entertaining room (fully built in) perfect for those family gatherings. The master bedroom offers a WIR plus a BIR, ensuite and a ceiling fan for those warm summers nights, 2 of the 3 other bedrooms offer built in robes and ceiling fans and are all serviced by the centrally located bathroom.
Outside features a decked alfresco area, tandem remote garage with drive through access to the spacious rear yard, shedding and fully established gardens.
Extras include:
- Ducted gas heating
- 3 x split systems
- 7m x 12m workshop in rear yard
- 4 Water tanks (approx. 8000 litres)
- 5KW solar system (battery ready)
- Cellar
- Under house storage
Public transport is a short walk away, along with Highton Reserve and the Porter Avenue shops. The vibrant Highton Village is also within easy reach, providing you with a wide selection of shopping and dining options. Families will appreciate that Bellaire P.S is within easy walking distance, while a variety of nearby schools include Belmont High School and Christian College Campuses. Enjoy easy access to the Ring Road, Epworth Hospital, and Deakin Uni.
Insights: 16 Amberley Court, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 108 other 4 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
Superb Freestanding Unit, Just Renovated
This easily accessible secure unit is beautifully positioned between the Bellevue Ave shopping precinct and the Barwon River. Offering every available amenity, Highton boasts; transport, allied health facilities and some of Geelong's best cafés.
A quality renovation comprising the following; new kitchen, tiling, carpet, bathroom, laundry, blinds and freshly painted.
2 bedrooms, with built in robes
Spacious open lounge, dining and kitchen
Modern bathroom
Separate laundry and toilet
Single car park and private rear yard
At Wilsons we are conscious of playing our part in reducing the spread of COVID-19. We will therefore be conducting our property inspections using best practice sanitary measures to ensure everyone's safety. We can also arrange a virtual tour of the home if that better suits. Contact us today.

Description:
Location and Lifestyle
Here's an opportunity to break into one of Leopold's best pockets and make your mark.
Bordered by parkland and situated in a quiet cul-de-sac, this home presents an excellent opportunity for first home buyers and investors alike. Low-maintenance, well-built and an abundance of indoor living and covered outdoor entertaining space, it has appeal for every buyer. Comprised of:
4 bedrooms, master with walk in robe, ensuite and split system heating and cooling
Newly tiled main bathroom with bath, powder room and laundry
Oversize double garage with internal house access
Gas central heating throughout, split system air-conditioning/heating and ceiling fans
Massive outdoor, undercover entertaining, dining and cooking area
Huge family living room and separate open plan dining/casual living space and kitchen
Bordering parkland, netball courts and a skate park and less than a
3 minute walk to the café's, restaurants and shopping at Gateway Plaza
Leopold's best value and best located home-walk to everything! A short drive to Queenscliff, the beaches of Ocean Grove or only 15 minutes into the centre of Geelong. It's easy to see why this region is booming.
At Wilsons we are conscious of playing our part in reducing the spread of COVID-19. We will therefore be conducting our property inspections using best practice sanitary measures to ensure everyone's safety. We can also arrange a virtual tour of the home if that better suits. Contact us today.

Description:
Custom designed home in private court location
This spacious contemporary home will be sure to excite merging countryside & modern style living. You'll marvel over its unique features & quality upgrades that make this home so enticing. The open-plan kitchen, living and dining naturally flows out to the sun-glazed alfresco, offering families plenty of space to catch up or entertain. Don't miss out on seeing for yourself how perfectly this build caters to all your family needs!
Kitchen- SMEG appliances, 900mm freestanding gas cooktop, oven & range hood, black tile splashback filling kitchen walls with feature window splashback backing double sink, ample overhead storage with underlying lighting beneath cupboards, stone benchtop with overhang for breakfast bench, wine rack, stainless steel appliances, built in pantry
Living- open plan adjoining living, dining & kitchen, timber laminate flooring & downlights throughout, ducted heating & ceiling mounted split system cooling, double glass sliding doors off open plan living/ dining create a natural indoor outdoor flow to alfresco deck for a fantastic spacious family zone, window curtains for privacy
Second living- feature barn door providing theatre room privacy from open plan living zone, timber laminate flooring, matte black ceiling fan with light, roller blinds
Master bedroom- matte black ceiling fan & light, ducted heating, roller blinds, walk in robe, ensuite with large vanity & countertop basin, semi frameless shower & personal toilet
Additional two bedrooms- carpeted, ceiling fan, roller blinds, built in robes, ducted heating
Main bathroom- semi frameless shower, countertop basin & generous vanity, hexagonal mosaic tiles feature alongside bath fitted with spa jets, separate toilet
Outdoor- large alfresco deck, low maintenance backyard & easy maintenance garden wrapping the property fencing, backyard rotary clothesline
Mod cons- semi secluded study filled with natural light & fitted with dual roller blinds, laundry with linen press, trough and side house access, generous sized double lock up garage providing room for storage of bikes, surfboards, etc, second living barn door is a focal feature of the home merging country & modern style, ducted heating throughout and solar panels for eco friendly year round comfort, open plan indoor outdoor living zone caters to those whole love to entertain
Ideal for: social couples, families, investors, First Home Buyers
Close by local facilities: Marshall train station (walking distance) allowing easy access to Melbourne, Grovedale College, Primary School & Kindergarten, Grovedale IGA supermarket
*All information offered by Armstrong Real Estate is provided in good faith. It is derived from sources believed to be accurate and current as at the date of publication and as such Armstrong Real Estate simply pass this information on. Use of such material is at your sole risk. Prospective purchasers are advised to make their own enquiries with respect to the information that is passed on. Armstrong Real Estate will not be liable for any loss resulting from any action or decision by you in reliance on the information. PHOTO ID MUST BE SHOWN TO ATTEND ALL INSPECTIONS *

Description:
FANTASTIC CONTEMPORARY LOW MAINTENANCE LIVING IN A GREAT LOCATION!!!
This beautiful contemporary residence provides seclusion and privacy, at the same time delivering an unbeatable position with access down your own private driveway. The distinctive and modern two storey home's clever design emphasises generous flowing spaces, smart storage solutions and makes the most of living and entertaining, whether it be indoors or out. The convenient location ensures a quality low maintenance lifestyle, being only metres from the Esplanade, Flying fox park and family friendly whites beach. The light filled lower level boasts the open plan living zone, with the kitchen offering stone bench tops, walk in pantry, induction cooktop and dual ovens opening out to a north facing private alfresco area. The master bedroom with walk in robe, and en-suite, laundry and powder room complete this level. Upstairs incorporates 3 further bedrooms with built in robes, family bathroom with bath, spacious second living area including a study nook with built in cabinetry completing the faultless floor plan. Other features include: Cosy wood fire, split system heating and cooling, ducted vacuum system, ceiling fans in all bedrooms, outdoor shower, alarm system, under-stair storage, garden shed, single car lock up garage with internal access private driveway with plenty of parking, lovely low maintenance gardens, transport at your doorstep and much more.
With nothing more to do than move in, this is your opportunity to own a great property and be one of the many people currently enjoying the beachside lifestyle on offer in this superb location, book your inspection today!! As an inspection will not disappoint!!

Description:
Terrific Tremont
Idyllic location, sunny light filled living and just right in every way, this home epitomises the quintessential Barwon Heads lifestyle.
Positioned to capitilise on its northerly aspect, the open plan living zone is a highlight. It features timber lined vaulted ceilings and opens effortlessly on to extensive outdoor entertaining. The kitchen includes Bosch appliances, a large central island and Caesarstone bench tops. The adjacent second living area is the perfect spot for cosy winters in front of the gas log fire while the rest of the home is kept warm by ducted heating. There are three bedrooms in total plus a study. The master has a lovely outlook of the adjoining parklands as well as a walk-in robe and en-suite. The additional bedrooms share a contemporary bathroom with a large frameless glass shower.
Outdoors the established gardens are a delight with shady and sunny spots to relax and entertain in. Numerous rainwater storage tanks keep it all looking lush. The back gate access to the 54 acre community park is a coveted bonus as is the solar power too. Plentiful off street parking ensures space to park the caravan or boat and a solid carport with secure storage/workshop is also included.
This quiet court location offers instant access to the park, a short walk to the river and shops, with the beach nearby too. Welcome home to effortless living and a home with a heart and soul.
Insights: 6 Tremont Court, Barwon Heads VIC 3227 was last sold in 2020 and 35 other 4 bedroom house in Barwon Heads have recently been sold.

Description:
Expansive Views in Blue Chip Belmont 902m2
Positioned in a tightly held and coveted pocket of Belmont, this extremely rare and elevated allotment of approx. 902m2 presents an outstanding opportunity to secure vacant land with uninterrupted views over parkland and the Barwon River.
In a parkside location at the end of a no-thru road, the property is located approx. 3.5 kms from the Geelong CBD and is within walking distance to the High Street shopping precinct, Highton Village and cosmopolitan Pakington Street via the foot bridge to Newtown.
Offering an outstanding mixture of lifestyle, convenience and privacy, plus a beautiful northerly aspect, the rarity of vacant land so close to the city will make this property a popular opportunity to build your dream home or to subdivide and develop (STCA)
Inspect: Contact Agents or as Advertised
*COVID-19 INSPECTION PROCEDURE*
From Monday 03/08/20 onwards, all persons inspecting a property must wear a personal face mask.
Hand sanitiser will be provided prior to entry and during the inspection the touching of surfaces (ie. cupboards, etc) must be minimised.
If you wish to inspect a property and are from a Stage 4 lockdown area (ie. Greater Melbourne), unfortunately at present the advice from the government is that you are not allowed to inspect in person. However, please contact the listing agent for further details as we will do our best to facilitate a virtual tour for you (ie. FaceTime etc).
We thank you for your understanding.

Description:
Space, Style And Central Location
An impressive outdoor entertaining zone, bright open-plan living, exceptionally stylish bathrooms and high quality finishings are some of the many highlights of this 3-bedroom family home set on a surprisingly large block in the heart of Leopold. Tucked away in a peaceful neighbourhood, it's within walking distance to sporting facilities, the bustling Gateway Plaza and serene Gateway Sanctuary, and just moments from Leopold Primary School and childcare options.
Bright and open, the main dining and living space is welcoming and sophisticated and comes with hardy, scratch-proof timber laminate flooring. The home's contemporary kitchen offers beautiful grey Caesarstone benchtops with a striking dark-coloured splashback, Technika oven/cooktop and Westinghouse dishwasher, and a fantastic Butler's pantry. The generous master suite has a WIR and modern ensuite featuring a walk-in shower, floor-to-ceiling light grey tiling, a black hexagonal-tile splashback and trendy matte black tapware. The bathroom with bath, vanity and separate WC shares the same stylish aesthetic, and services the minor bedrooms, each with triple BIRs and plush carpets. Ducted heating, a Fujitsu split system and ceiling fans take care of climate control, and push-button light switches throughout add extra class.
The spectacular undercover outdoor entertaining area can be fully-enclosed using state-of-the-art Ziptrak blinds, significantly extending the home's floor plan. Outdoor heaters maintain comfort on even the coldest nights, and extensive in-built cabinetry is ideal for housing the BBQ and bar fridge. The low-maintenance rear yard is spacious, with plenty of room for the kids and pets to roam; it has a garden shed, and a border of ornamental pear trees which provide a thick green privacy screen over summer, and let sunshine flood through during winter months.
Extras include an oversized DLUG, solar hot water, an integrated watering system and European laundry. This home has it all: space, style and a fantastic central location. Contact Liam for an inspection today.
- Central location close to shops, reserves, primary school and childcare
- High quality build on an exceptionally generous allotment
- Spectacular alfresco has Ziptrak blinds, heaters, in-built cabinetry and a TV point
- Master suite offers a WIR and a stylish ensuite with walk-in shower
- Contemporary kitchen comes with butler's pantry and Caesarstone benchtops
- Reach Geelong's CBD in a little over 10 minutes, and Melbourne in a bit over an hour
Insights: 11 Glendale Drive, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 101 other 3 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
Location with a Family Home in mind.
When you talk about location in real estate, you don't get much better than this quality family home within walking distance to Leopold Primary School, Leopold Community Hub, Gateway Shopping Centre and the Leopold Sportsmans Club. Location, with entertaining and convenience in mind. Situated with sweeping views over Geelong from within the front living room and all on 693m2 approx!
Entering this beautiful home, you will be surprised by its natural size and what it has to offer. It boasts 3 generous sized bedrooms, all with built-in robes (main with updated en-suite and a walk-in robe), and spacious study / 4th bedroom. As you walk through the home, you have the front living room as mentioned with views overlooking Geelong adjacent to the formal dining area. The updated family bathroom is located centrally with a stand-alone shower. There is also an enormous light-filled, open plan living zone with Italian tiles throughout. It also features a large kitchen with a bench top / breakfast bench, ample cupboard space and quality stainless steel appliances. The spacious lounge features convenient gas wall heating. Adjoining the 2nd living space is an alfresco area, perfect for year-round entertaining / living. Add to this double remote lock-up garage plus workshop area (perfect for the tradie), split system cooling, and low maintenance garden allowing you to do what you want on the weekends. A must inspection

Description:
Luxury, Style & Space
With few words to describe the calibre of this stunning home, it is bound to blow you away from the moment you step through the front door. Displaying refined elegance throughout, this five-bedroom family home will cater to any family dynamic. Located in the highly sought after Birchbank Estate, positioned on a corner block in a private court location and set an on enormous allotment of 925m2 approx.
Offering 5 generous sized bedrooms, 3 impressive separate living zones, and an abundance of car accommodation. Every last detail has been taken care of, from the grand hallway that greets you upon entry, to the stunning rear yard that has been lovingly maintained. The home consists of a luxury main bedroom with walk in robe, private ensuite and an adjacent living room, perfect for a parent retreat area. The remaining four bedrooms are all serviced by the central bathroom and separate toilet.
The open plan kitchen, dining and living area provides the ultimate family friendly arrangement, as well as a perfect space to entertain. The immaculate kitchen will impress even the fastidious chef, including quality stainless steel appliances, step in pantry and large island bench. Located at the rear of the home is the 3rd living/ rumpus room, a space for the children to enjoy. This practical floorplan is completed by a large laundry with ample storage.
Outdoors has just as much on offer. With a magnificent alfresco area opening up from the open plan zone, indoor outdoor entertaining has never been so easy. Overlooking the fully landscaped gardens with plenty of room for family and pets to enjoy. In addition to all of this, the home has no shortage of space when it comes to vehicle accommodation. With an oversized double garage with drive through access to the rear yard, perfect for securely storing a boat, caravan or trailer, as well as side gate access to the large carport, providing ample storage possibilities. Added extras include ducted heating and split system cooling, ceiling fans, downlights, alarm security system and a water tank.
Only 10 minutes to Geelong CBD and 13 minutes to the ever-popular Ocean Grove beach. Make this your reality, an inspection is a must to truly understand the quality of this masterpiece on offer! Dont miss this one.
Insights: 4-5 Waugh Court, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 19 other 5 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
Turn Key coastal home in convenient location!
Youll love:
This perfectly presented home featuring an open plan layout with an abundance of natural light is ideal for all buyers alike who desire a turn key solution.
Low maintenance living with three bedrooms, large study, two living areas and there is gas central heating and evaporative cooling throughout.
The contemporary kitchen has a 900mm oven, stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances and a large island bench that adjoins the generous living space.
Plus:
The master bedroom features a WIR and ensuite which is tucked away from the additional bedrooms
A landscaped garden with undercover area with deck provide the perfect compact entertainment area
Located in a family friendly location and only a few minutes drive to the beach, conveniently located to the shopping district, schools and walking trails, this home is sure to impress.
Generous size 2 car garage with extra space for storage, internal access to home and drive through to backyard

Ultimate "Barwon" Lifestyle
The Feel:
Nestled quietly in the heart of Barwon Heads, this freshly updated residence offers an incredible opportunity. Park the car and walk anywhere from the golf course, surf beach, shops or river. Dont miss the chance to live the Barwon lifestyle.
The Facts:
-Centrally located & only a few minutes walk to shops & the majestic Barwon River
-Ideally positioned north courtyard
-Single level brick veneer unit with front veranda
-Neatly presented residence ideal for downsizers, first home buyer or holiday home
-3 bedrooms with full size built-in robes
-Brand new carpets and recently freshly painted
-Sunny living room with SS Heating & Cooling
-Central bathroom with vanity, shower & separate WC
-Secondary bathroom and Laundry
-Low maintenance rear yard
-Single Carport
The Owner Loves.
Summer days spent at the river watching our grand kids, long walks along the beach, nipping down to the shops for milk, what else can you ask for living in the Barwon"

Description:
Refreshed and Ready to Move In.
This immaculate renovated home positioned in the sought after suburb of Belmont could be the idyllic addition to your rental portfolio, also for those wanting to get into the market, could potentially be your first home.
The property is light and bright, with open plan living, polished floorboards and low maintenance garden.
To the front of the home is the spacious living area which flows to the kitchen and dining area. The kitchen with plenty of storage, including large island bench and S/S appliances make this an entertainer's delight.
The master bedroom with new ensuite, looks out onto the rear garden with the further two bedrooms, all with BIRs are complimented by an updated bathroom with bath and overhead shower.
Heating and cooling is accounted for with ducted floor heating, split systems and ceiling fans throughout. The remote single lock-up garage provides secure parking, with the long driveway offering plenty of additional off-street parking.
This home offers an easy lifestyle in an established neighbourhood, within a short drive to Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre & High St shops. First home buyers & investors will no doubt see great value in this fantastic home on such a central location. Approximate rental of $400 per week.
A great opportunity to enter the popular Belmont property market!

Description:
Large Blue Chip Belmont Family home
Set high on Tettenhall Ridge this two-story home would suit a growing family or keen investor with a potential rent of $470 pw, wanting a blue chip home well located close to schools, leisure activities and the Waurn Ponds shopping precinct.
Set on 705m2 elevated block this home comprises of an open plan living downstairs which flows onto the newly renovated dining space with polished concrete flooring. The brand new renovated kitchen is equipped with new benchtops, wall oven and microwave space, a near new Fisher & Pykel dishwasher, gas cooktop with exposed rangehood, large pantry and built in dining table.
Down the hall you will find an updated laundry with outside access and a separate toilet. 3 good sized bedrooms, all with new carpet and ceiling fans, 2 bedrooms equipped with BIR storage.
Upstairs you will find a second family living room with Coonara wood heater, a 7.4KW Fujitsu reverse cycle split system for all year-round comfort. There is also a front balcony with views back to the Waurn Ponds creek, regional baseball fields and the Waurn Ponds shopping precinct.
The master bedroom is also located on the second level and offers his and hers BIR storage and a handy ensuite with large shower, vanity & W.C. There is also a side balcony looking over the rear back yard and established trees.
Outside you will find a good-sized rear yard ideal for children or your four-legged friend. There is also an undercover pergola with new lazer light roofing making this a great space for outdoor entertaining.
There is ample parking in the driveway with two spaces undercover and multiple garden sheds for the keen gardener.
This great blue-chip home is ideally located on the border of Belmont and Waurn ponds,
walking distance to the library, Leisurelink & the shopping precinct, all with easy access to schools, public transport and the Ring Road.
FEATURES
• 7.4 KW Fujitsu Split system
• Vulcan Heater & Wood Coonara
• Polished Concrete Floors
• Newly updated Kitchen
• Bus Stop on doorstep
• Rent pw $470 apx.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Nestled in nature with direct beach access
Youll love:
Nestled amongst the sand dunes & seclusion of Breamlea, this rare 657m2 allotment offers direct beach access to one of the Surf Coasts best kept secrets.
The sense of tight knit community & of being connected to the tranquil ocean & wetlands surrounds.
Plus:
Township zoned & with all the necessary connections available, this elevated block is ready for you to build the home of your dreams.
Live close enough to all the action of Torquay and Barwon Heads, yet far enough away to enjoy this peaceful and private hamlet.
Insights: 15 Horwood Drive, Breamlea VIC 3227 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
Spacious Living Moments From Deakin Uni (Waurn Ponds) & Epworth Hospital!
If you've been searching for spacious family living, then this is the one for you! Set upon approx. 687m2, this impressive property features three living zones, a north-facing alfresco, and an oversized double garage with workshop!
This superb location will leave you wanting nothing. Deakin University (Waurn Ponds) is within walking distance, along with public transport and the Epworth Hospital. Families will appreciate that a selection of schools are close by, including Marcus Oldham College and the Christian College Campuses. The Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre provides you with an abundance of shopping and dining options, while superior Ring Road access is ideal for Melbourne commuters. With a rental return of approx. $650 per week, this conveniently located home is a terrific investment opportunity.
The wide entrance welcomes you into the home. The lounge is graced with a gas log fireplace, while the open plan living/dining/kitchen zone flows onto the north-facing covered alfresco - creating an indoor-outdoor connection that is perfect for entertaining! The kitchen caters for cooking enthusiasts with a large walk-in pantry and Westinghouse stainless steel appliances (dishwasher and 900mm oven, gas cooktop, rangehood). The generous island bench conveniently doubles as a breakfast bar. With double doors allowing the rumpus room to be closed off from the open plan living zone, children and teens can enjoy their own space.
Overlooking the established front garden, the spacious Master Bedroom features a walk-in robe and en suite. Four additional bedrooms (two with built-in robes, two with walk-in robes) are serviced by the main bathroom and powder room. The laundry boasts a walk-in linen press. Modcons include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, and an alarm system. The oversized remote double lock-up garage also features internal access, storage, and a separate toilet. The secure and low-maintenance backyard is home to veggie gardens, two garden sheds, and a rainwater tank. You can enjoy direct access to Pigdons Road via the back gate.
You'll need to act swiftly to secure this spacious Highton residence! Inspect without delay!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.
Insights: 125 Fogarty Avenue, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 29 other 5 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
Sold Before Advertising
With views of Greater Geelong, Corio Bay and the You Yangs this beautiful refurbished home offers the luxurious lifestyle you deserve.
The two spacious living areas feature high ceilings, an indoor fireplace and a magnificent barn style door, all adding to the character of the home. A convenient study is tucked into the back of the main lounge area.
The sun-washed north-facing master bedroom features a walk in robe and ensuite, floor to ceiling windows and door to your very own private balcony.
The refurbished kitchen will delight enthusiastic of cooks with stainless steel appliances, gas cooking, a walk in pantry and to the side, a dining area fit for a family. Outside a perfect entertainment space all year round featuring an open fire, vertical garden and grass space for the kids or pets to enjoy.
Plenty of parking is provided with a double garage with internal access and a double carport
Insights: 11 Donvale Drive, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 94 other 4 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.
